title: Orange Chipotle Ketchup Recipe
full_text:
Orange Chipotle Ketchup Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Makes
3/4 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
ketchup
2
tablespoons
freshly squeezed
orange juice
1
tablespoon
finely chopped
chipotle chiles in adobo
plus
1
teaspoon
adobo sauce
1
tablespoon
honey
1
teaspoon
ground cumin
1
teaspoon
freshly
minced garlic
(about 1 clove)
Directions
Whisk together ketchup, orange, chipotles, adobo sauce, honey, cumin, and garlic in a small bowl. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to two weeks.
Condiments & Sauces
Orange
Chile Pepper
